code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Routes,Route}from'react-router-dom';import'./App.css';import Home from'./pages/Home';import About from'./pages/About';import SiteNavbar from'./components/SiteNavbar';import Skills from'./pages/Skills';import Projects from'./pages/Projects';import Contact from'./pages/Contact';import API_BASE_URL from'./config';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[profile,setProfile]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"api/profile")).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setProfile(data)).catch(err=>setError("Backend is not reachable")).finally(()=>setLoading(false));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"app-bg",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"app-content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Router,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SiteNavbar,{profile:profile,loading:loading,error:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Home,{profile:profile,loading:loading,error:error})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/about",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(About,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/skills",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Skills,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/projects",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Projects,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/contact",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Contact,{})})]})]})})});}export default App;
